title: en_ivan_shamyakin
snippet:
{
"photo":"https://www.peoples.ru/military/hero/shamyakin/shamyakin_12.jpg",
"fullName":"Ivan Petrovich Shamyakin",
"birthDate":"1921",
"deathDate":"2004",
"birthCity":"Korma village, Dobrush district, Gomel region",
"deathCity":"Minsk",
"description":"Belarusian Soviet writer, screenwriter and playwright, public figure. People's writer of the Belarusian SSR (1972). Hero of Socialist Labor (1981). Laureate of the Stalin Prize of the third degree (1951). Member of the CPSU (b) since 1943. Academician National Academy of Sciences of Belarus (1994). "
}
